These beautifully decorated suites have one bedroom and a separated sitting room, a bathroom and a WC and are a good choice for those wishing a comfort and luxurious stay in a carefully designed space.
• Double bed or 2 twin beds joined together • Balcony • 1 WC and 1 bathroom with bathtub • Floors made of wood or stone • Work desk • Refrigerator • LCD TV • Pay TV and Satellite TV • Free internet by using a cable • Environmentally-friendly mattress COCO-MAT and selected pillows • Luxury cotton towels and slippers • Hair dryer • Safety box • Direct phone line • Safety box • Direct phone line
